songs.lyrics:
Yeah
15
This one is for the champs
Shout out to Noreaga
My big brother DJ EFN
On the track Hazardis Soundz, SP Killa
Familia!

We bout to hop on a tour bus
For two months straight so don’t even try to ignore us
I’m bout to pick up my pace
Bendicion
Give a blessing everywhere we stepping
We speak tongues
So just decode or be done
I need a blessing for family
Especially my twin sons
The family is where I can’t be
They hold me down when we run
No blessing for those that’ll damn me
We don’t bite on our tongues
I’ll let you know just what I can’t be
So don’t be surprised when we’re done
Tomorrow’s the first show of the fifth tour
With the Tech Nine and the sick four
Actually now just three of us
We still hold it down like a rickshaw
If they criticize eat a dick whore
Epitomizing piss poor
Not to minimize what you live for
But I’m energized for the next war
Ducking crabs in a stew pot
Fresh back from the Bmore
All these rappers trying to doo wop
Feeling stranded on the sea floor
I’m about to tap into 2Pac
Attitude on Ybor
I got a taste that is too hot
So what you biting off of me for
Hands down all these damn clowns got a bad sound no damn style
Got my member all swollen now I’m feeling like a mad child
Kiddie rappers act mad wild
Speaking reckless bout the fam now
Y’all let these goons act out
Too late to get them to back down
I’m getting better and better
And still now more betterer betterer
Killing shows and killing flows you know etcetera etcetera
They talk a lot shit about guns funds and how they be killing man
But they just junkies kicking xan all they can do Is kilogram
We up on stage and with the fans
They underrate us in the scan
Come and get faded with the fam
All for the sake of living grand
I been just phasing with the band
Playing these places in the land
So many faces in the stands
I’mma get wasted trying to stand
So come and just get with the musical murderers
Coming from to state to state and city to city
We’re In it for serving ya
Music my love and I murder her
Bring her right back to the furtherer
It goes up tour starts right now please pack up the perjurers
songs.title: Bendicion (Freestyle)
